turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to order a few pizzas from Sir Pizza tonight.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, I can help you with that. What type of pizzas did you want to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: First, I would like a large pepperoni.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, I have an order for a large pepperoni pizza. Would you like anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I would also like to get a medium taco pizza, without black olives.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I have also ordered a medium taco pizza without black olives. Would you like to add anything else to your order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want a medium pizza with hamburger and sausage as well please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I have the order for the medium hamburger and sausage placed. Any other items for your order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, add two garden salads and a two liter soda, and that will be all.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What kind of soda do you want to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like a Cheerwine.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: For this order, I have a large pepperoni pizza, a medium taco pizza with no black olives, a medium pizza with hamburger and sausage, two garden salads and a two liter Cheerwine. Is this correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Add a slice of cherry cheesecake too please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I have added a slice of cherry cheesecake. Will this complete your order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I think that will be all. Can you charge it to my account?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, your receipt will be sent to your mobile device via text message.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Place the order for the name Davis, my husband is going to pick the order up.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: The order has been placed for the name Davis.  Is there anything else I can help you with?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, what time to they close tonight?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sir Pizza closes at ten p.m.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok, that is all I need, thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your order will be ready for pickup in about 25 minutes.

items.name: The order has been placed for the name Davis
